title: Mane 'n Tail Original Shampoo & Conditioner,16 oz each
description: A complete system of hair care especially designed to help hair look and feel thicker and healthier. Originally intended for actual horse manes and tails, this shampoo softens even the coarsest of human hair types, too. Hair is left shinier and smoother, and the intensely moisturizing formula conditions the scalp as well.

title: Guess by Marciano 3.4oz 100ml EDP Spray
description: Launched by the design house of Guess.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: Fairy Dust by Paris Hilton for Women - 3.4 Ounce EDP Spray
description: When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied
